short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple branded links manager and shortener.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create branded links (short URLs with a custom domain name) directly from the page you are visiting

LinkMngr is the complete solution for branded link management. It is the quickest way to share your links in order to increase traffic and brand awareness. 

Features
★ Easily shorten any link
★ Multiple domain Names 
★ Custom links

NOTE: Saving and sharing with the LinkMngr Chrome Extension is the same as saving and sharing with the LinkMngr website. The LinkMngr Chrome Extension does not collect any additional data about your browsing activity or history.

For more information visit: https://linkmngr.com
